body: Well just here for the comment... I already did in 100000.. They skipped 100006 though
Why did he bring friends into it this would of been perfect if it was just one guy!!

A story, in which a dumb as F*ck girl blindly relies on an apparently kind guy who consoled her as she was crying because she had been dumped. As a cynical boss arrogantly told me during a break, "Suckers are destined to be scammed, so I may as well be the one taking their money", the same “law” applies to the hentai world, if a girl is hot, foolish and naive, she’s going to get some d*ck whether she wants it or not.
